#hiringalert Job Synopsis Designation/Title: Asst. Manager Corporate Communication Company: Namdhari’s Group Location: Bidadi & Jayanagar, Bangalore Primary Roles & Responsibilities: -Develop effective corporate communication strategies. -Manage internal communications (memos, newsletters, etc.). -Draft content (e.g., press releases) for mass media or company website. -Organize initiatives and plan events or press conferences. -Liaise with media and handle requests for interviews, statements, etc. -Manage and monitor all PR-related activities and media. -Foster relationships with internal and external key persons. -Collaborate with marketing professionals to produce copy for advertisements or articles. -Perform damage control in cases of bad publicity. -Facilitate the resolution of disputes with the public or external vendors. -Assist in the communication strategies or messages from senior leadership. -Be flexible and open to changing priorities and challenges. -Understand technical and business concepts and express these concepts in clear, concise instructions. Desired Candidate Profile: -Extensive knowledge of branding principles and multimedia tactics, including the web. -Sound written and verbal communication skills, coupled with highly developed interpersonal skills. -Sound time management skills to ensure multiple tasks are completed within compressed timeframes. -Expert strategic and proactive leadership and presence. -Sound active listening skills, critical thinking skills, and team-oriented working skills. -Creative and visionary leadership with the ability to drive a high volume of work to completion. -Proven ability to design, develop, and implement both communications and strategic programs and supporting tactics. Interested candidates can share your resume at sagar.s@simplinamdharis.com Company Overview: The Namdhari's Group, established three decades ago as a seed research and marketing organization, has evolved into an Indian multinational food agribusiness. At Namdhari Seeds, we specialize in breeding, producing, and distributing high-quality vegetable varieties with superior yield, disease resistance, and adaptability to various agro-climatic conditions (http://namdhariseeds.com/). We are today exporting our seeds and fruits & vegetables to South-East Asian countries and the Middle East (https://namdharifresh.com/). Our commitment to a 'farm-to-fork' approach is reflected in Simpli Namdhari's, a 100% vegetarian Omni Channel retail chain in Bangalore. It offers a comprehensive range of fresh fruits & vegetables, organic & pesticide-free staples, single-origin dairy products (https://dairytales.com/), imported dry fruits, healthy snacks, and more. #jobopening #corpcomm #communications
